bisq.core.util.joptsimple

Class EnumValueConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bisq.core.util.joptsimple.EnumValueConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    joptsimple.ValueConverter<java.lang.Enum>

    public class EnumValueConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements joptsimple.ValueConverter<java.lang.Enum>
    A ValueConverter that supports case-insensitive conversion from String to an enum label. Useful in conjunction with ArgumentAcceptingOptionSpec.ofType(Class) when the type in question is an enum.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnumValueConverter(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Enum> enumType) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Enum convert(java.lang.String value)
      Attempt to resolve an enum of the specified type by looking for a label with the given value, trying all case variations in the process.
      java.lang.String valuePattern() 
      java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Enum> valueType()

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public java.lang.Enum convert(java.lang.String value)
        Attempt to resolve an enum of the specified type by looking for a label with the given value, trying all case variations in the process.
        Specified by:
        convert in interface joptsimple.ValueConverter<java.lang.Enum>
        Returns:
        the matching enum label (if any)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no such label matching the given value is found.
